title: Veterans Town Hall on the Move

breadcrumb.text: Veterans Town Hall on the Move

entityMetatags.value: VA Pittsburgh health care | Veterans Town Hall on the Move | Veterans Affairs
VA Pittsburgh Healthcare System Interim Director Barbara Forsha invites you to attend the Town Hall event. Veterans, their families and the public are welcome to attend.

fieldDescription: VA Pittsburgh Healthcare System Interim Director Barbara Forsha invites you to attend the Town Hall event. Veterans, their families and the public are welcome to attend.

fieldBody.processed:
VA Pittsburgh Healthcare System Interim Director Barbara Forsha invites you to attend the Town Hall event. Veterans, their families and the public are welcome to attend.

Front line employees, including experts from the Veterans Benefits Administration, will be available to offer on-the-spot assistance with individual questions and concerns.
